summary: Player house in Solstheim. Small, comfortable, should be lore-friendly.
descriptionHtml:
When I recieved permission to live in the Severin manor, I was disappointed to have such a terrible place to call home. That's why I've created my own house, that completely satisfied me.
If you love small, lore-friendly houses, this mod is totaly for you.

This mod requires all DLC's to be installed (Dawnguard. Hearthfire. Dragonborn)

The house itself is located in Raven Rock, down by the road after Severin manor. You can't miss it.

What can you find in there:
- Oven to cook sweet, tasty pies
- Cooking pot to make soups and stakes
- Lots of alcohol to make your travels happier
- Library to store knowledge for future generations
- Alchemy Lab to either create deadly poisons or helpful potions
- Arcane Enchanter to put spells on weapons and armor
- Staff Enchanter to create your very own magical staff
- Smithy and all that's related to it
- Storages for your precious loot
- Quick passage to Skyrim from your house and
- Quick passage to your house from Skyrim directly for impatient ones

The key can be found on the barrel, beside the entrance.

Since it's my first mod, there might be some bugs and/or glitches, so you are most welcome to report them.

And I wouldn't recommend walking in there with companions - they might get stuck
author: whitefoxray
